title: I Got a Present from Santa-san - Novel Updates
tags: Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   First Love   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Modern Day   Short Story   Unrequited Love
author: Hio Akito   氷魚　彰人
description:
The protagonist, Shiragami Jin, is dumped by his lover on Christmas Day, and while he’s walking through the city, he is called out to by a bunch of hooligans. Just as he’s about to flip out on them, a macho man in a Santa costume steps between them… What will he get from his unexpected encounter with Santa?

It’s a story about how the former yankee (but pure and a crybaby) Shiragami gets dumped at Christmas and finds happiness again.>
